topic.title: HPE Helion Development Platform 2.0: ALS Command Reference: Applications

ul.li: helion app: Show the information of the specified application.
helion apps: List the applications deployed to the target.
helion list: List the applications deployed to the target.
helion releases: Show the list of versions for the specified application.
helion versions: Show the list of versions for the specified application.

section.title: Syntax
section.p: For more information, use the helion help or helion help [command] commands.

section.title: helion app <application>
section.p: Shows the information of the specified application.

row.entry: --json
Print raw json as output, not human-formatted data.
--manifest
Path of the manifest file to use. If not specified, a search is performed.
--organization, -o
The once-off organization to use for the current operation..
--path
Path of the directory holding the application files to push. Defaults to the current working directory.
--space, -s
The once-off space to use for the current operation, specified by name. Cannot be used together with --space-guid.
--space-guid
The once-off space to use for the current operation, specified by GUID. Cannot be used together with --space.
--target
The once-off target to use for the current operation only.
--token
The once-off authentication token to use for the current operation only.
--token-file
Path to an existing and readable file containing the targets and authorization tokens.
